analyzed: pramāṇa prameya saṃśaya prayojana dṛṣṭānta siddhānta avayava tarka nirṇaya vāda jalpa vitaṇḍā hetvābhāsa chala jāti nigraha sthānānām tattva jñānāt
duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyājñānānām uttara uttara apāye tad anantarā pāyāt apavargaḥ

original: 1.1.4: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakam pratyakṣam
analyzed: indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam

original: 1.1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca
analyzed: atha tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca
saḥ dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt
ātma śarīra indriya artha buddhi manaḥ pravṛtti doṣa pretyabhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ tu prameyam
icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam iti
ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ

original: 1.1.13: pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni
analyzed: pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni
gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ tad arthāḥ

original: 1.1.23: samānānekadharmopapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.1.24: yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam
analyzed: yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam

original: 1.1.25: laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasmin arthe buddhisāmyam saḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
analyzed: laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam saḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
saḥ caturvidhaḥ sarva tantra prati tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthiti arthāntara bhāvāt
sarva tantra aviruddhaḥ tantre adhikṛtaḥ arthaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ
samāna tantra siddhaḥ para tantra asiddhaḥ prati tantra siddhāntaḥ
yad siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddhiḥ saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ
pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni avayavāḥ
sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam

original: 1.1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ
analyzed: udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ

original: 1.1.40: avijñātatatve arthe kāraṇopapattitaḥ tattvajñānārtham uhaḥ tarkaḥ
analyzed: avijñāta tatve arthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham tarkaḥ
vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ
iti nyāya sūtre prathama adhyāyasya prathamam āhnikam
yathā ukta upapannaḥ chala jāti nigrahasthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ
savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇasama sādhyasama kālātītāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ
yasmāt prakaraṇa cintā saḥ nirṇaya artham apadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ
vacana vighātaḥ artha vikalpa upapattyā chalam

original: 1.2.11: tat trividham - vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca iti
analyzed: tat trividham vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca iti

original: 1.2.12: aviśeṣābhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt arthāntarakalpanā vākchalam
analyzed: aviśeṣa abhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt artha antara kalpanā vākchalam
sambhavataḥ arthasya ati sāmānya yogāt asambhūta artha kalpanā sāmānyacchalam
aviśeṣe vā kiñcid sādharmyāt eka chala prasaṅgaḥ
tad vikalpāt jāti nigrahasthāna bahu tvam
iti nyāya sūtre prathama adhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam
samāna aneka dharma adhyavasāyāt anyatara dharma adhyavasāyāt vā na saṃśayaḥ
avyavasthā ātmani vyavasthita tvāt ca avyavasthāyāḥ
tathā atyanta saṃśayaḥ tad dharma sātatya upapatteḥ

original: 2.1.6: yathoktādhyavasāyāt eva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye na asaṃśayaḥ na atyantasaṃśayaḥ vā
analyzed: yathā ukta adhyavasāyāt eva tad viśeṣa apekṣāt saṃśaye na asaṃśayaḥ na atyanta saṃśayaḥ vā
yatra saṃśayaḥ tatra evam uttara uttara prasaṅgaḥ

original: 2.1.9: pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau na indriyārthasannikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ
analyzed: pūrvam hi pramāṇa siddhau na indriya artha sannikarṣāt pratyakṣa utpattiḥ
paścāt siddhau na pramāṇebhyaḥ prameya siddhiḥ
yugapad siddhau prati artha niyata tvāt krama vṛtti tva abhāvaḥ buddhīnām
sarva pramāṇa pratiṣedhāt ca pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ
tad prāmāṇye vā na sarva pramāṇa vipratiṣedhaḥ
traikālya apratiṣedhaḥ ca śabdāt ātodya siddhi vat tad siddheḥ
pramāṇataḥ siddheḥ pramāṇānām pramāṇa antara siddhi prasaṅgaḥ
tad vinivṛtteḥ vā pramāṇa siddhi vat prameya siddhiḥ
na pradīpa prakāśa siddhi vat tad siddheḥ

original: 2.1.20: kvacit nivṛttidarśanāt anivṛttidarśanāt ca kvacit anekāntaḥ
analyzed: kvacid nivṛtti darśanāt anivṛtti darśanāt ca kvacid anekāntaḥ
na ātma manasoḥ sannikarṣa abhāve pratyakṣa utpattiḥ
diś deśa kāla ākāśeṣu api evam prasaṅgaḥ
jñāna liṅga tvāt ātmanaḥ na anavarodhaḥ
tad ayaugapadya liṅga tvāt ca na manasaḥ

original: 2.1.26: pratyakṣanimittatvāt ca indriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya svaśabdena vacanam
analyzed: pratyakṣa nimitta tvāt ca indriya arthayoḥ sannikarṣasya sva śabdena vacanam
supta vyāsakta manasām ca indriya arthayoḥ sannikarṣa nimitta tvāt
pratyakṣam anumānam eka deśa grahaṇāt upalabdheḥ

original: 2.1.32: na, pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvat api upalambhāt
analyzed: na pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvat api upalambhāt
na ca eka deśa upalabdhiḥ avayavi sadbhāvāt

original: 2.1.37: senāvanavat grahaṇam iti cet na atīndriyatvāt aṇūnām
analyzed: senāvana vat grahaṇam iti ced na atīndriya tvāt aṇūnām
rodha upaghāta sādṛśyebhyaḥ vyabhicārāt anumānam apramāṇam
na eka deśa trāsa sādṛśyebhyaḥ artha antara bhāvāt
na atīta anāgatayoḥ itaretara apekṣā siddhiḥ
vartamāna abhāve sarva agrahaṇam pratyakṣa anupapatteḥ
kṛta tā karttavya tā upapatteḥ tu ubhayathā grahaṇam
atyanta prāya eka deśa sādharmyāt upamāna asiddhiḥ
prasiddha sādharmyāt upamāna siddheḥ yathā ukta doṣa anupapattiḥ

original: 2.1.48: na apratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārtham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ
analyzed: na apratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇa artham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ

original: 2.1.49: tathā iti upasaṃhārāt upamānasiddheḥ na aviśeṣaḥ
analyzed: tathā iti upasaṃhārāt upamāna siddheḥ na aviśeṣaḥ
śabdaḥ anumānam arthasya anupalabdheḥ anumeya tvāt
āpta upadeśa sāmarthyāt śabdāt artha sampratyayaḥ
pūraṇa pradāha pāṭana anupalabdheḥ ca sambandha abhāvaḥ
na sāmayika tvāt śabda artha sampratyayasya
tad aprāmāṇyam anṛta vyāghāta punarukta doṣebhyaḥ
vidhi artha vāda anuvāda vacana viniyogāt

original: 2.1.65: stutiḥ nindā parakṛtiḥ purākalpaḥ iti arthavādaḥ
analyzed: stutiḥ nindā parakṛtiḥ purākalpaḥ iti arthavādaḥ
mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat ca tad prāmāṇyam
iti nyāya sūtre dvitīya adhyāyasya prathamam āhnikam

original: 2.2.2: śabde aitihyānarthāntarabhāvāt anumāne arthāpattisambhavābhāvānarthāntara bhāvāt ca apratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: śabde aitihya anartha antara bhāvāt anumāne arthāpatti sambhava abhāva anartha antara bhāvāt ca apratiṣedhaḥ
tad prāmāṇye vā na arthāpatti aprāmāṇyam
lakṣiteṣu alakṣaṇa lakṣita tvāt alakṣitānām tad prameya siddheḥ

original: 2.2.9: asati arthe na abhāvaḥ iti cet na,
analyzed: asati arthe na abhāvaḥ iti ced na
ādima tvāt aindriyaka tvāt kṛtaka vat upacārāt ca

original: 2.2.14: na, ghaṭābhāvasāmānyanityatvāt nityeṣu api anityavat upacārāt ca
analyzed: na ghaṭa abhāva sāmānya nitya tvāt nityeṣu api anitya vat upacārāt ca
prāk uccāraṇāt anupalabdheḥ āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ ca
anupalambhāt anupalabdhi sadbhāvāt na āvaraṇa anupapattiḥ anupalambhāt

original: 2.2.31: anyat anyasmāt ananyatvāt ananyat iti anyatābhāvaḥ
analyzed: anyat anyasmāt ananya tvāt ananyat iti anya tā bhāvaḥ
aśravaṇa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ satata śravaṇa prasaṅgaḥ
pāṇi nimitta praśleṣāt śabda abhāve na anupalabdhiḥ
vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca avasthāne tad nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ
nyūna sama adhika upalabdheḥ vikārāṇām ahetuḥ

original: 2.2.43: dvividhasya api hetoḥ abhāvāt asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
analyzed: dvividhasya api hetoḥ abhāvāt asādhanam dṛṣṭāntaḥ
na tad vikārāṇām suvarṇa bhāva avyatirekāt
varṇa tva avyatirekāt varṇa vikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ
nitya tve avikārāt anitya tve ca anavasthānāt

original: 2.2.53: nityānām atīndriyatvāt taddharmavikalpāt ca varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: nityānām atīndriya tvāt tad dharma vikalpāt ca varṇa vikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ
anavasthāyi tve ca varṇa upalabdhi vat tad vikāra upapattiḥ

original: 2.2.55: vikāradharmitve nityatvābhāvāt kālāntare vikāropapatteḥ ca apratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: vikāra dharmi tve nitya tva abhāvāt kāla antare vikāra upapatteḥ ca apratiṣedhaḥ
niyama aniyama virodhāt aniyame niyamāt ca apratiṣedhaḥ
guṇa antara āpatti upamarda hrāsa vṛddhi śleṣebhyaḥ tu vikāra upapatteḥ varṇa vikārāḥ
vyakti ākṛti jāti sannidhau upacārāt saṃśayaḥ
yā śabda samūha tyāga parigraha saṅkhyā vṛddhi apacaya varṇa samāsa anubandhānām vyaktau upacārāt vyaktiḥ
sahacaraṇa sthāna tādarthya vṛtta māna dhāraṇa sāmīpya yoga sādhana ādhipatyebhyaḥ brāhmaṇa mañca kaṭa rāja saktu candana gaṅgā śāṭaka anna puruṣeṣu a tad bhāve
ākṛtiḥ tad apekṣa tvāt sattva vyavasthāna siddheḥ

original: 2.2.66: vyaktyākṛtiyukte api aprasaṅgāt prokṣaṇādināṃ mṛdgavake jātiḥ
analyzed: vyakti ākṛti yukte api aprasaṅgāt prokṣaṇa ādinām jātiḥ
na ākṛti vyakti apekṣa tvāt jāti abhivyakteḥ
iti nyāya sūtre dvitīya adhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam
tad vyavasthānāt eva ātma sadbhāvāt apratiṣedhaḥ
na ekasmin nāsā asthi vyavahite dvi tva abhimānāt
eka vināśe dvitīyā vināśāt na eka tvam
avayava nāśe api avayavi upalabdheḥ ahetuḥ
na ātma pratipatti hetūnām manasi sambhavāt
jñātuḥ jñāna sādhana upapatteḥ saṃjñā bheda mātram
pūrva abhyasta smṛti anubandhāt jātasya harṣa bhaya śoka sampratipatteḥ
padma ādiṣu prabodha sammīlana vikāra vat tad vikāraḥ
na uṣṇa śīta varṣā kāla nimitta tvāt pañca ātmaka vikārāṇām
pretya āhāra abhyāsa kṛtāt stanya abhilāṣāt
ayasaḥ ayaskānta abhigamana vat tad upasarpaṇam
sa guṇa dravya utpatti vat tad utpattiḥ
na saṅkalpa nimitta tvāt rāga ādīnām
pārthiva āpya taijasam tad guṇa upalabdheḥ
gandha kleda pāka vyūha avakāśa dānebhyaḥ pāñcabhautikam

original: 3.1.32: kṛṣṇasāre sati upalambhāt vyatiricya ca upalambhāt saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇasāre sati upalambhāt vyatiricya ca upalambhāt saṃśayaḥ
raśmi artha sannikarṣa viśeṣāt tad grahaṇam
na anumīyamānasya pratyakṣataḥ anupalabdhiḥ abhāva hetuḥ
dravya guṇa dharma bhedāt ca upalabdhi niyamaḥ
aneka dravya samavāyāt rūpa viśeṣāt ca rūpa upalabdhiḥ
karma kāritaḥ ca indriyāṇām vyūhaḥ puruṣa artha tantraḥ
madhyandina ulkā prakāśa anupalabdhi vat tad anupalabdhiḥ
a prāpya grahaṇam kāca abhra paṭala sphaṭika antarita upalabdheḥ
āditya raśmeḥ sphaṭika antarite api dāhye avighātāt
ādarśa udakayoḥ prasāda svābhāvyāt rūpa upalabdhiḥ
dṛṣṭa anumitānām hi niyoga pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ
sthāna anya tve nānātvāt avayavi nānā sthāna tvāt ca saṃśayaḥ
gandha tva ādi avyatirekāt gandha ādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ
na buddhi lakṣaṇa adhiṣṭhāna gati ākṛti jāti pañcatvebhyaḥ
gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdānām sparśa paryantāḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: 3.1.63: ap-tejo-vāyūnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvam apohya ākāśasya uttaraḥ
analyzed: ap tejaḥ vāyūnām pūrvam pūrvam apohyaḥ ākāśasya uttaraḥ
ekaikaśyena uttara guṇa asadbhāvāt uttarottarāṇām tad anupalabdhiḥ
tat hi avasthānam tu bhūyaḥ tvāt
tad upalabdhiḥ itaretara dravya guṇa vaidharmyāt
iti nyāya sūtre tṛtīya adhyāyasya prathamam āhnikam
sphaṭika anya tva abhimāna vat tad anya tva abhimānaḥ

original: 3.2.10: sphaṭike api aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvāt vyaktīnām ahetuḥ
analyzed: sphaṭike api apara apara utpatteḥ kṣaṇika tvāt vyaktīnām ahetuḥ
kṣīra vināśe kāraṇa anupalabdhi vat dadhi utpatti vat ca tad utpattiḥ
na payasaḥ pariṇāma guṇa antara prādurbhāvāt
vyūha antarāt dravya antara utpatti darśanam pūrva dravya nivṛtteḥ anumānam

original: 3.2.17: kvacit vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacit ca upalabdheḥ anekāntaḥ
analyzed: kvacid vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ kvacid ca upalabdheḥ anekāntaḥ
yugapad jñāna anupalabdheḥ ca na manasaḥ
tat ātma guṇa tve api tulyam
indriyaiḥ manasaḥ sannikarṣa abhāvāt tad anutpattiḥ
vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca avasthāne tad nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ
anitya tva grahāt buddheḥ buddhi antarāt vināśaḥ śabda vat

original: 3.2.25: jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣāt manasaḥ smṛtyutpatteḥ na yugapat utpattiḥ
analyzed: jñāna samaveta ātma pradeśa sannikarṣāt manasaḥ smṛti utpatteḥ na yugapad utpattiḥ
na antar śarīra vṛtti tvāt manasaḥ
na tad āśu gati tvāt manasaḥ
ātma preraṇa yadṛcchā jña tābhiḥ ca na saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ
vyāsakta manasaḥ pāda vyathanena saṃyoga viśeṣeṇa samānam
praṇidhāna liṅga ādi jñānānām ayugapad bhāvāt ayugapad smaraṇam
jñasya icchā dveṣa nimitta tvāt ārambha nivṛttyoḥ
tad liṅga tvāt icchā dveṣayoḥ pārthiva ādyeṣu apratiṣedhaḥ

original: 3.2.38: yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryāt akṛtābhyāgamāt ca na manasaḥ
analyzed: yathā ukta hetu tvāt pāratantryāt akṛta abhyāgamāt ca na manasaḥ
pariśeṣāt yathā ukta hetu upapatteḥ ca
dveṣa bhaya arthi tva kriyā rāga dharma adharma nimittebhyaḥ
avyakta grahaṇam anavasthāyi tvāt vidyut sampāte rūpa avyakta grahaṇa vat
na pradīpa arciḥ santati abhivyakta grahaṇa vat tad grahaṇam
dravye sva guṇa para guṇa upalabdheḥ saṃśayaḥ
yāvat śarīra bhāvi tvāt rūpa ādīnām
na pāka ja guṇa antara utpatteḥ
tvac paryanta tvāt śarīrasya keśa nakha ādiṣu aprasaṅgaḥ
alāta cakra darśana vat tad upalabdhiḥ āśu sañcārāt
yathā ukta hetu tvāt ca aṇu
pūrva kṛta phala anubandhāt tad utpattiḥ
na utpatti nimitta tvāt mātā pitroḥ
śarīra utpatti nimitta vat saṃyoga utpatti nimittam karma

original: 3.2.68: tat adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punaḥ tatprasaṅgaḥ apavarge
analyzed: tat adṛṣṭa kāritam iti ced punar tad prasaṅgaḥ apavarge
manaḥ karma nimitta tvāt ca saṃyoga avyucchedaḥ
nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ ca prāyaṇa anupapatteḥ
aṇu śyāma tā nitya tva vat etat syāt
iti nyāya sūtre tṛtīya adhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam
trairāśyam rāga dveṣa moha artha antarbhāvāt
nimitta naimittika bhāvāt artha antara bhāvaḥ doṣebhyaḥ
nimitta naimittika upapatteḥ ca tulya jātīyānām apratiṣedhaḥ
na atīta anāgatayoḥ kāraka śabda prayogāt
na puruṣa karma abhāve phlā niṣpatteḥ
nimitta nimittayoḥ artha antara bhāvāt apratiṣedhaḥ
tad anitya tvam agneḥ dāhyam vināśya anuvināśa vat
na aneka lakṣaṇaiḥ eka bhāva niṣpatteḥ
sadyas kāla antare ca phala niṣpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ
na sadyas kāla antara upabhogya tvāt
prāk niṣpatteḥ vṛkṣa phala vat tat syāt
na asat na sat na sat asat
āśraya vyatirekāt vṛkṣa phala utpatti vat iti ahetuḥ
na putra paśu strī pariccheda hiraṇya anna ādi phala nirddeśāt
tad sambandhāt phala niṣpatteḥ teṣu phala vat upacāraḥ
vividha vādhanā ayogāt duḥkham eva janma utpattiḥ
bhādhanā nivṛtteḥ vedayataḥ pryeṣaṇa doṣāt apratiṣedhaḥ
ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti anubndhāt apavarga abhāvaḥ
pradhāna śabda anupapatteḥ guṇa śabdena anuvādaḥ nindā praśaṃsā upapatteḥ
pātra caya anta anupapatteḥ ca phala abhāvaḥ
suṣuptasya svapna adarśane kleśa abhāvāt apavargaḥ
prāk utpatteḥ abhāva anitya tva vat svābhāvike pi anitya tvam
aṇu śyāma tā nitya tva vat vā
na saṅkalpa nimitta tvāt ca rāga ādīnām
iti nyāya sūtre caturtha adhyāyasya prathamam āhnikam
doṣa nimittānām tattva jñānāt ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ
doṣa nimittam rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayaḥ saṅkalpa kṛtāḥ
vṛtti anupapatteḥ api tarhi na saṃśayaḥ
kṛtsna eka deśa avṛtti tvāt avayavānām avayavi abhāvaḥ
ekasmin bheda abhāvāt bheda śabda prayoga anupapatteḥ apraśnaḥ
avayava antara bhāve pi avṛtteḥ ahetuḥ
keśa samūhe taimirika upalabdhi vat tad upalabdhiḥ
sva viṣaya anatikrameṇa indriyasya paṭu manda bhāvāt viṣaya grahaṇasya na aviṣaye pravṛttiḥ
avayava avayavi prasaṅgaḥ ca evam ā pralayāt
ākāśa a sarva gata tvam vā
antar bahis ca kārya dravyasya kāraṇa antara vacanāt akārye tad abhāvaḥ
śabda saṃyoga vibhāvāt ca sarva gatam
avyūha aviṣṭambha vibhu tvāni ca ākāśa dharmāḥ
mūrtimatām ca saṃsthāna upapatteḥ avayava sadbhāvaḥ
anavasthā kāri tvāt anavasthā anupapatteḥ ca apratiṣedhaḥ

original: 4.2.26: buddhyā vivecanāttu bhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhistantvapakarṣaṇe paṭasadbhāvānupalabdhivat tadanupalabdhiḥ
analyzed: buddhyāḥ vivecanāt tu bhāvānām yāthātmya anupalabdhiḥ tantu apakarṣaṇe paṭa sadbhāva anupalabdhi vat tad anupalabdhiḥ
svapna viṣaya abhimāna vat ayam pramāṇa prameya abhimānaḥ
smṛti saṃkalpa vat ca svapna viṣaya abhimānaḥ
mithyā upalabdheḥ vināśaḥ tattva jñānāt svapna viṣaya abhimāna praṇāśa vat pratibodhe
buddheḥ ca evam nimitta sadbhāva upalambhāt
tattva pradhāna bhedāt ca mithyā buddheḥ dvaividhya upapattiḥ
pūrva kṛta phala anubandhāt tad utpattiḥ
tad artham yama niyama abhyāsa ātma saṃskāraḥ yogāt ca adhyātma vidhi upāyaiḥ
jñāna grahaṇa abhyāsaḥ tad vidyaiḥ ca saha saṃvādaḥ
tam śiṣya guru sabrahmacāri viśiṣṭa śreyaḥ rthibhiḥ anasūyibhiḥ abhyupeyāt
pratipakṣa hīnam api vā prayojana artham arthi tve
tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham jalpa vitaṇḍe
bīja praroha saṃrakṣṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā āvaraṇa vat
iti nyāya sūtre caturtha adhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam
patti aviśeṣa upapatti upalabdhi anupalabdhi nitya anityaka ārya samāḥ
sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām upasaṃhāre tad dharma viparyaya upapatteḥ sādharmya vaidharmya samau
sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇya vikalpa sādhyasamāḥ
kiñcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāra siddheḥ vaidharmyāt apratiṣedhaḥ

original: 5.1.7: prāpya sādhyamaprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvādaprāptyāsādhāka tvācca prāptyaprāptisamau
analyzed: prāpya sādhyam a prāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā a viśiṣṭa tvāt aprāptyā a sādhāka tvāt ca prāpti aprāpti samau
ghaṭa ādi niṣpatti darśanāt pīḍane ca abhicārāt apratiṣedhaḥ
dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta samau
pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve ca na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
tathā bhāvāt utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ na kāraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ
sāmānya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ aindriyaka tve samāne nitya anitya sādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ

original: 5.1.15: sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyādubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyanta saṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyūpagamācca sāmānyasyāpratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye tyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ nitya tva anabhyūpagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ
pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ
na hetutaḥ sādhya siddheḥ traikālyāt siddhiḥ
anuktasya arthāpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anukta tvāt anaikāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ
eka dharma upapatteḥ aviśeṣe sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt sadbhāva upapatteḥ
kvacid dharma anupapatteḥ kvacid ca upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ
nirdiṣṭa kāraṇa abhāve pi upalambhāt upalabdhisamaḥ
kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhisamaḥ
jñāna vikalpānām ca bhāva abhāva saṃvedanāt adhyātmam
sādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anityasamaḥ
sādharmyāt asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt ca

original: 5.1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya tasysa cobhayathā bhāvānnāviśeṣaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhya sādhana bhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya tasya sa ca ubhayathā bhāvāt na aviśeṣaḥ
nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ nityasamaḥ
pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ
kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ
pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe pratiṣedha doṣa vat doṣaḥ

original: 5.1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
analyzed: pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ matānujñā

original: 5.1.43: svapakṣalakṣanāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣā bhyupagamāt samāno doṣa iti
analyzed: sva pakṣa lakṣana apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāre hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti
iti nyāya sūtre pañcama adhyāyasya prathamam āhnikam

original: arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāpta kālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam
analyzed: arthāntaram nirarthakam avijñāta artham apārthakam aprāpta kālam nyūnam adhikam punaruktam

original: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo
analyzed: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ mata anujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam niranuyojyānuyogaḥ
pakṣa pratiṣedhe pratijñāta artha apanayanam pratijñā sannyāsaḥ
aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetvantaram
pariṣad prativādibhyām tris abhihitam api avijñātam avijñātārtham
śabda arthayoḥ punarvacanam punaruktam anyatra anuvādāt
anuvāde tu apunaruktam śabda abhyāsāt artha viśeṣa upapatteḥ

original: 5.2.17: vijñātasya pariṣadā triḥ abhihitasya api apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam
analyzed: vijñātasya pariṣadā tris abhihitasya api apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam
sva pakṣe doṣa abhyupagamāt para pakṣe doṣa prasaṅgaḥ matānujñā
siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ
iti nyāya sūtre pañcama adhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam
